constructMessage(String, int[][], int[][]) - Method in class org.gamelink.game.Cram
The constructMessage method formats the message to be sent to the opponents, this message will represent the a move made by the player and will include the move, the game board before the move was applied, and the game board after the move was applied.
constructMessage(String, int[][], int[][], int) - Method in class org.gamelink.game.Kalah
The constructMessage method formats the message to be sent to the opponents, this message will represent the a move made by the player and will include the move, the game board before the move was applied, the game board after the move was applied and the player number of the player to move next

S

Scheduler - Class in org.gamelink.tournament
The Scheduler class is used to create a tournament structure for all matches to be played it ensures that every team plays every other team twice; once as player 1 and once as player 2

The scheduler constructor initializes the tournament by creating all matches Teams and Algorithms and adding them to the corresponding ArrayList
